document.full_text: russian security forces said on friday that at least 10 islamist militants had been killed in a special operation in russia's volatile and mostly muslim north caucasus region.
document.title: russia: 10 militants said to be killed in north caucasus
lines_and_colors: russian security forces said on friday that at least 10 islamist militants had been killed in a special operation in russia's volatile and mostly muslim north caucasus region.
